LanguageData.VQE_ArchiteVolunteer1.title: archite volunteer
LanguageData.VQE_ArchiteVolunteer1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in a secret military program that promised glory and strength. The experiments left [PAWN_objective] tougher than most, but the treatments damaged [PAWN_possessive] fine motor skills and stability.
LanguageData.VQE_TrialSubject2.title: trial subject
LanguageData.VQE_TrialSubject2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] signed away [PAWN_possessive] rights for a chance to join an experimental unit. Endless injections and training made [PAWN_objective] resilient, but constant observation and confinement left [PAWN_objective] anxious and withdrawn.
LanguageData.VQE_GeneFighter3.title: gene fighter
LanguageData.VQE_GeneFighter3.description: Chosen for a military experiment, [PAWN_nameDef] underwent forced genetic alterations meant to create stronger soldiers. The project gave [PAWN_objective] an edge in battle, but the constant tests left little time for education or civilian skills.
LanguageData.VQE_MilitaryExperiment4.title: military experiment
LanguageData.VQE_MilitaryExperiment4.description: [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for classified experiments, believing it was [PAWN_possessive] duty. Enhanced reflexes and stronger muscles were the results — but at the cost of chronic pain and a short temper.
LanguageData.VQE_EnhancedSoldier5.title: enhanced soldier
LanguageData.VQE_EnhancedSoldier5.description: [PAWN_nameDef] became part of a military program to create supersoldiers through archite injections. The procedures hardened [PAWN_objective] for combat, but the constant modifications dulled [PAWN_possessive] sense of self and left [PAWN_objective] detached from ordinary life.
LanguageData.VQE_BoneReforged6.title: bone reforged
LanguageData.VQE_BoneReforged6.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was subjected to a brutal trial where every bone in [PAWN_possessive] body was shattered, replaced, and rebuilt with reinforced grafts. The process left [PAWN_objective] nearly unbreakable, but the constant agony scarred [PAWN_possessive] mind forever.
LanguageData.VQE_SkinGrafted7.title: skin grafted
LanguageData.VQE_SkinGrafted7.description: [PAWN_nameDef] underwent repeated skin-flaying and regenerative grafting, designed to test rapid healing serums. The experiments made [PAWN_objective] resistant to injury, but also dulled [PAWN_possessive] sense of touch and left [PAWN_possessive] body covered in scars.
LanguageData.VQE_BrainProbed8.title: brain probed
LanguageData.VQE_BrainProbed8.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a horrific program where archite nodes were drilled directly into [PAWN_possessive] brain. The procedures heightened reflexes and memory recall, but frequent blackouts and haunting visions still plague [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.VQE_MuscleStitched9.title: muscle stitched
LanguageData.VQE_MuscleStitched9.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured endless cycles of muscle excision and forced regrowth, each time restitched into denser configurations. The outcome was immense strength, but [PAWN_possessive] body remains grotesquely uneven and constantly aches from the strain.
LanguageData.VQE_EyeReplaced10.title: eye replaced
LanguageData.VQE_EyeReplaced10.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had both eyes removed and replaced with unstable experimental augments, meant to track targets in darkness. The implants improved [PAWN_possessive] aim, but left [PAWN_objective] sensitive to light and forever reliant on strange visual overlays.
LanguageData.VQE_StressTest11.title: stress test subject
LanguageData.VQE_StressTest11.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was confined for weeks in controlled conditions, deprived of sleep and overloaded with sensory input to measure endurance. The tests broke [PAWN_possessive] nerves, leaving [PAWN_objective] twitchy but strangely resistant to stress.
LanguageData.VQE_ToxicExposure12.title: toxic exposure
LanguageData.VQE_ToxicExposure12.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sealed in chambers filled with toxic vapors as part of a military resilience program. The experience scarred [PAWN_possessive] lungs and burned [PAWN_possessive] skin, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to push through sickness and pain.
LanguageData.VQE_PainTolerance13.title: pain tolerance trial
LanguageData.VQE_PainTolerance13.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured endless procedures designed to push the limits of human pain tolerance. Though the agony left [PAWN_objective] hardened, [PAWN_pronoun] never truly recovered [PAWN_possessive] sense of trust in others.
LanguageData.VQE_IsolationChamber14.title: isolation chamber
LanguageData.VQE_IsolationChamber14.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a silent, lightless cell for months while researchers studied the effects of sensory deprivation. The ordeal left [PAWN_objective] distant and withdrawn, but strangely focused when working alone.
LanguageData.VQE_CombatDrills15.title: combat drill subject
LanguageData.VQE_CombatDrills15.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced through punishing combat drills meant to test the breaking point of soldiers under fire. The brutal regimen honed [PAWN_possessive] instincts, but left [PAWN_objective] with lingering injuries and a deep mistrust of authority.
LanguageData.VQE_DeceptionStudy16.title: deception study
LanguageData.VQE_DeceptionStudy16.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed in a program that rewarded lying and punished honesty. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at reading people, but found it difficult to form genuine connections.
LanguageData.VQE_GroupConflict17.title: conflict subject
LanguageData.VQE_GroupConflict17.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was locked in rooms with other subjects while researchers manipulated resources to force conflict. The constant fighting sharpened [PAWN_possessive] survival instincts, but trust became impossible.
LanguageData.VQE_ObedienceTrial18.title: obedience trial
LanguageData.VQE_ObedienceTrial18.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years in a program designed to test the limits of obedience to authority. Following orders became second nature, but [PAWN_objective] never learned to make decisions for [PAWN_objective]self.
LanguageData.VQE_IsolationTest19.title: isolation test
LanguageData.VQE_IsolationTest19.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into false social situations where allies would suddenly vanish or betray them. The shifting rules left [PAWN_objective] paranoid, but keenly aware of small details others overlook.
LanguageData.VQE_LossExperiment20.title: loss experiment
LanguageData.VQE_LossExperiment20.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was made to form bonds with fellow subjects, only to watch them be taken away again and again. The grief left scars, but also gave [PAWN_objective] an unusual resilience to despair.
LanguageData.VQE_BetrayalStudy21.title: betrayal study
LanguageData.VQE_BetrayalStudy21.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into experiments where subjects were paired as close companions, only to be tricked into betraying one another for survival. The cruelty broke [PAWN_possessive] ability to trust, but sharpened [PAWN_possessive] instincts for danger.
LanguageData.VQE_FalseFamily22.title: false family
LanguageData.VQE_FalseFamily22.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed into simulated households with strangers acting as kin, only to have them vanish without explanation. This cycle repeated until [PAWN_pronoun] stopped forming bonds at all, surviving instead through cold detachment.
LanguageData.VQE_StarvationTrial23.title: starvation trial
LanguageData.VQE_StarvationTrial23.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured experiments where food was withheld and rations were deliberately uneven, forcing subjects to beg or fight for scraps. Hunger carved deep scars into [PAWN_possessive] mind, leaving [PAWN_objective] restless and distrustful of generosity.
LanguageData.VQE_CompassionPunished24.title: compassion punished
LanguageData.VQE_CompassionPunished24.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived through trials where showing kindness meant punishment, while cruelty was rewarded. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hide compassion behind a mask of cold obedience, though the instinct to care never fully left.
LanguageData.VQE_SilenceStudy25.title: silence study
LanguageData.VQE_SilenceStudy25.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in enforced silence, punished for speaking or even making noise. The isolation left [PAWN_objective] almost mute in groups, but gave [PAWN_possessive] an uncanny focus when working alone.
